title: Adding Server SSL cert.
body:
Would like there to be a way to add the server's/users public SSL cert to the login screen so that the skipping of SSL check isn't required.
Please let us know how this can be accomplished.
author: TheCount2255

comments.body:
Just so your aware, it isn't skipping SSL connection, the connection is still using SSL just not validating the SSL certificate.  The application still uses standard SSL (HTTPS) connections and if your server has SSL certificates configured correctly then simply use the FQDN of your server and uncheck the box. 

Let me know if that information helps you?

title: User Credentials remembered from session to session
body:
I think that I have found a bug. When I close the application and relaunch it the user creds are remembered from the previous session.
This is without selecting the "remember login" box.
